description.short: Enterprise iOS/tvOS development with 14 AI agents, 27 skills, automated quality gates, and one-command setup. SwiftUI + MVVM + Clean Architecture.
description.long:
Complete multi-agent orchestration system for professional iOS and tvOS development.

ðŸš€ Quick Setup: One command initializes your entire development environment with /ios-init

ðŸ¤– 14 Specialized Agents:
â€¢ Workflow Orchestration - 6-phase development lifecycle
â€¢ Code Generation - Core layer, Presentation layer, Design System
â€¢ Quality Gates - SwiftLint, build validation, 80% test coverage
â€¢ Testing - Test pyramid enforcement and coverage analysis
â€¢ Utilities - File discovery, log analysis, accessibility testing, performance profiling

ðŸ“š 27 Comprehensive Skills:
â€¢ Core (4): Swift conventions, SwiftUI patterns, MVVM architecture, Clean Architecture
â€¢ Networking (2): Alamofire patterns, API integration
â€¢ UI (3): Navigation, Atomic Design, Theme management
â€¢ Data (2): Model patterns, Core Data
â€¢ Testing (2): XCTest patterns, Quality gates
â€¢ Advanced (13): Error handling, Concurrency, Accessibility, Performance, Security, and more
â€¢ Platform (1): tvOS-specific patterns
â€¢ Tools (3): SwiftGen, Localization, Session management

âš¡ Automated Workflows:
â€¢ /ios-init - One-command project setup
â€¢ /ios-dev - Complete feature development
â€¢ /ios-feature - Feature-driven development
â€¢ /ios-debug - Debugging and log analysis
â€¢ /ios-refactor - Code quality improvements

ðŸŽ¯ Quality Assurance:
â€¢ SwiftLint strict mode enforcement
â€¢ Xcodebuild validation for iOS and tvOS
â€¢ 80% minimum test coverage
â€¢ Test pyramid validation
â€¢ Automated quality gate checkpoints

ðŸ—ï¸ Architecture Patterns:
â€¢ MVVM with BaseViewModel
â€¢ Clean Architecture (Core â†’ Presentation â†’ Design System)
â€¢ Protocol-Oriented Programming
â€¢ Atomic Design
â€¢ Repository Pattern

ðŸ“± Platform Support:
â€¢ Universal iOS and tvOS support
â€¢ Platform-specific patterns
â€¢ SwiftUI-only modern approach
â€¢ Async/await concurrency
â€¢ Focus engine for tvOS

ðŸ’¡ Advanced Features:
â€¢ Offline-first data sync with Core Data
â€¢ Push notifications with APNs and rich media
â€¢ tvOS focus navigation and parallax effects
â€¢ Accessibility testing (WCAG 2.1 Level AA)
â€¢ Performance profiling with Instruments
â€¢ Background sync with BGTaskScheduler

ðŸ”— Beads Integration:
â€¢ Automatic epic and task creation
â€¢ Multi-session work tracking
â€¢ Phase dependency management

ðŸ§  Memory Systems:
â€¢ Working memory (24h TTL)
â€¢ Episodic learning for proven patterns
â€¢ 15-30% faster on similar features

ðŸ“¦ What You Get:
â€¢ 72 files with 40,000+ lines
â€¢ Complete examples
â€¢ 12 architectural rules
â€¢ Hooks system for automation
â€¢ Comprehensive documentation

changes: Added 3 new utility agents (accessibility, performance, SwiftGen)
Added 13 new skills (error handling, concurrency, accessibility, etc.)
Enhanced 6 agents with comprehensive implementation patterns
Enhanced 8 skills from 17-81 lines to 200-600 lines each
Expanded debug and refactor commands to 3,370-3,693 lines
Added hooks system with 6 automation scripts
Added 3 advanced examples (offline sync, push notifications, tvOS)
